definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
karst landform (weathered limestone, often forming caves)

sentences.english: Thank you for taking the time to come over.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝您特地來我們這兒。

sentences.english: I'm here specially to meet you.
I went to barbershop and got a haircut specially.
sentences.chinese: 我特地到理髮店修整了髮型。

sentences.english: I went out of my way to get you this gift.
sentences.chinese: 我特地去給你買的這件禮物。

sentences.english: She visited the country intentionally as it has very beautiful scenes.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知這個國家風景很美，她是特地去的。

sentences.english: The minge win order too eager to get a geography book.
sentences.chinese: 那個男孩特地火急地想要取得一當地輿書。

sentences.english: Lead the relationship between back and double grace, specially effort to coax back double grace.
sentences.chinese: 辛勇爲了挽回與雙怡的關係，特地花心思哄回雙怡。

sentences.english: I come especially to congratulate Grandpa on his birthday.
sentences.chinese: 今天我是特地來給爺爺拜壽的。
特地爲次寫下這篇日記。

sentences.english: Our products sell very well on the European market.
sentences.chinese: 我們的產品在歐洲市場上特地滯銷。

sentences.english: Specifically to disable all the dead skin products.
sentences.chinese: 停用一切特地去死皮的產品。

sentences.english: Fans often travel and take planes to come see us.
sentences.chinese: 粉絲們有時會特地跨地區坐飛機來看我們。

sentences.english: He came to Beijing on purpose to see you.
sentences.chinese: 他是特地到北京來看你的。

sentences.english: It's nice of you to come all the way to see me off.
sentences.chinese: 你真好，還特地老遠跑來爲我送行。

sentences.english: Why did he choose to come to my door.
sentences.chinese: 他爲什麼特地到我門前來呢？

sentences.english: DuSiMan in order to thank WuYanBin help, specially asked him to dine.
sentences.chinese: 杜思曼爲了感謝吳彥斌相助，特地請他喫飯。

definition: to take a lot of trouble (idiom); painstaking/at the cost of a lot of effort
that very night/through the night/for several nights in a row
suddenly have a thought (idiom)/suddenly be inspired to do something
